page.title: 09KINGSCLERE ESTATES LTD
page.content: About five twelfths of our area is farmed by Kingsclere Estates Ltd. This is only half of the area of their whole farm. Altogether they farm 2,000 acres. The soil is partly chalk, and the rest is clay cap with flints over- lying the chalk. They grow 885 acres of wheat, 253 acres of barley, 170 acres of oats, 556 acres of grass, and there are 144 acres of woodland. They have 350 breeding sows, 2,500 fattening pigs, 415 milking cows and 380 young cattle. The dairy cows average 1250 gallons of milk per year. The farm employs 30 people, and they use twelve tractors and two combine harvesters. Farmyard manure from the dairy and pig units is put back on to the land, and some fertilizers are used containing nitrogen, potash and phosphates. The fields have hedges and fences around them.
